verbs.description: jk [V: rowling] confirmed a fan theory about a scene in harry potter that showed how to properly say hermione name a harry potter fan posited that hermione taught viktor how to say her name in goblet of fire so readers could also learn jk rowling confirmed the theory on twitter hermione granger harry potter rowling twitter jk rowling goblet of fire hermione atulaak jk rowling viktor krum j k rowling
